alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 21 at 12:55PM MDT until July 22 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Purgatoire River Near Las Animas affecting Bent County. .Heavy rainfall over the past 24 hours will cause the Purgatoire River at Las Animas to remain above flood stage. For the Purgatoire River...including Las Animas...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Purgatoire River Near Las Animas. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor Flood. Minor agricultural flooding occurs into low lying areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM MDT Friday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:15 PM MDT Friday was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.8 feet on 06/06/1949. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1245 AM MDT.
